org.gridgain.grid.cache
Enum GridCacheFlag

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<GridCacheFlag>
      org.gridgain.grid.cache.GridCacheFlag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<GridCacheFlag>
public enum GridCacheFlag
extends Enum<GridCacheFlag>

Cache projection flags that specify projection behaviour. This flags can be explicitly passed into the following methods on GridCacheProjection:

  • GridCacheProjection.flagsOn(GridCacheFlag...)
  • GridCacheProjection.flagsOff(GridCacheFlag...)
Also, some flags, like GridCacheFlag.STRICT, GridCacheFlag.LOCAL, or GridCacheFlag.READ may be implicitly set whenever creating new projections and passing entries to predicate filters.

Wiki & Forum:

Enum Constant Detail

STRICT

public static final GridCacheFlag STRICT
No null values will be allowed into projection. Essentially this means that unless entry has a non-null value, it won't show up in any of the projection operations.

This projection is implicitly returned for the following cache operations:

  • GridCacheProjection.projection(Class, Class)
  • GridCacheProjection.projection(GridPredicate[])

LOCAL

public static final GridCacheFlag LOCAL
Only operations that don't require any communication with other cache nodes are allowed. This flag is automatically set on projection and all the entries that are given to predicate filters.

READ

public static final GridCacheFlag READ
Only operations that don't change cached data are allowed. This flag is automatically set on projection and all the entries that are given to predicate filters.

CLONE

public static final GridCacheFlag CLONE
Clone values prior to returning them to user.

Whenever values are returned from cache, they cannot be directly updated as cache holds the same references internally. If it is needed to update values that are returned from cache, this flag will provide automatic cloning of values prior to returning so they can be directly updated.

See Also:
GridCacheConfiguration.getCloner()

SKIP_STORE

public static final GridCacheFlag SKIP_STORE
Skips store, i.e. no read-through and no write-through behavior.

SKIP_SWAP

public static final GridCacheFlag SKIP_SWAP
Skip swap space for reads and writes.

SYNC_COMMIT

public static final GridCacheFlag SYNC_COMMIT
Synchronous commit.

SYNC_ROLLBACK

public static final GridCacheFlag SYNC_ROLLBACK
Synchronous rollback.

INVALIDATE

public static final GridCacheFlag INVALIDATE
Switches a cache projection to work in 'invalidation' mode. Instead of updating remote entries with new values, small invalidation messages will be sent to set the values to null.

See Also:
GridCacheTx.isInvalidate(), GridCacheConfiguration.isInvalidate()
